name: Crawling Critters
description:
Invisible critters are moving across an image, can you find them?!

Look at the critters on the left side of the screen and try to figure out where they are on the image on the right. Once you think you know where they are, click on that spot in the image. 

Be careful, they can move fast! Three missed and you lose.  Try out your skills on all four background images.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Works with mouse or touch.

(probably won’t have a great time on a phone screen)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Submission for PIGSquad Summer Slow Jams 2022 - July edition
